data.text: @Chris74329015 Its shut.. due to the outbreak of a mild flu virus a tyrannical bunch of cronies in government and a load of frightened little sheep who are afraid to live a life..

@Chris74329015 I understand information well. t.b.h you have obviously fallen into the trap of believing everything you are told..
I prefer to look at all the evidence available..
Like this and my own eyes... I don't see my neighbours and friends dieing..
You have your jab its your funeral https://t.co/Tf0cgyIRz5

@Chris74329015 I can see you have gone with all the propergander spewed out by the drugs companies that produce these vaccines the ones that have had fines in excess of $3billion in fines for this exact same thing.. I would rather take my chances with my 100% proven healthy immune system.

@Chris74329015 No quite right only... I should of said one year into human trials.. (animal trials were scrapped due to excessive deaths)
This is a completely new type of vaccine which is only able to be administered under emergency use..
